content: The Mercury rover avoids the day side where temperatures can be over 400 degrees Celsius, but travels on the night side where temperatures are colder than minus 100 degrees Celsius.
translations: ita:Il rover di Mercurio evita il lato diurno dove le temperature possono superare i 400 gradi Celsius, ma viaggia sul lato
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by nonong (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
